local_intent: Confirm visibility, realign precisely, and execute one 0.1m push of the T-block toward 180°.
assumptions: Yaw already set to 90° from prior step
Block and goal outline were already detected
Moderate surface friction; short timeouts suffice
coherence_with_global: Implements the active Push leaf within the transfer phase, preserving the perceive→align→act pattern and matching distance, direction, and timeout used in the GLOBAL_BT’s repeated pushes.
